text: Chop suey is a dish in American-Chinese cuisine.Chop Suey: An American Classic. www.smithsonianmag.com. Retrieved Jaunary 1, 2022. It is made with meat, often chicken, fish, pork or beef. There are also eggs and vegetables in it. It is usually served with rice or noodles.Chop Suey Appears In An 1884 Article In The Brooklyn Eagle. southfloridareporter.com. Retrieved Jaunary 1, 2022. There are many myths about chop suey. One is that in the 19th century it was invented by Chinese-American cooks working for the Transcontinental Railroad.CHOP SUEY - History and Origin. www.foodreference.com. Retrieved Jaunary 1, 2022. Chop suey appears in an 1884 article of the Brooklyn Eagle by Wong Chin Foo.Chop Suey Appears In An 1884 Article In The Brooklyn Eagle. southfloridareporter.com. Retrieved Jaunary 1, 2022. == References == Category:Asian foods
title: Chop suey
